Body: {"id":"chatcmpl-165","object":"chat.completion","created":1765404764,"model":"gpt-oss:120b-cloud","system_fingerprint":"fp_ollama","choices":[{"index":0,"message":{"role":"assistant","content":"","reasoning":"User asks in Russian: \"Покажи последнее упоминание Фуксии.\" Means \"Show the last mention of Fuksiya (probably a plant, genus Fukia?)\" Likely they refer to the book (maybe a document) we have indexed. We need to use navigation tools to search. We need to get last mention of \"Фуксии\". The tool can query whole book cursor with instruction to find last mention. Use NavigationPlugin_UseWholeBookCursor to create a cursor, then query with instruction. Perhaps use QueryCursor instruction: \"Find the last occurrence of the word \\\"Фуксии\\\" and return the surrounding text (a few sentences).\" So steps: create cursor with default forward? We want last mention, maybe go backward direction. Use UseWholeBookCursor direction backward, includeText true, maybe maxBytes 4096. Then use QueryCursor with instruction. Let's do that.\n\n","tool_calls":[{"id":"call_st7qmttu","index":0,"type":"function","function":{"name":"NavigationPlugin-UseWholeBookCursor","arguments":"{\"direction\":\"Backward\",\"includeText\":true,\"maxBytes\":4096,\"maxElements\":20}"}}]},"finish_reason":"tool_calls"}],"usage":{"prompt_tokens":626,"completion_tokens":241,"total_tokens":867}}
